ygData.subject: Re: Help I look like a Nazi
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, if it makes you feel any better, the Germans had spikes on their helmets in world war one, not world war two.  So you don t actually look like a
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, if it makes you feel any better, the Germans had spikes on their
helmets in world war one, not world war two. So you don't actually look like a
Nazi, you look like one of the Kaiser's boys :)

Apparently, btw, all the plate helms are getting looked at for redesign. I have
no idea when, but I Brad said so at GenCon (or someplace similar).

Jyzan -- proud of and loving his steel bird helm

p.s. for all the wood elves out there, the helmet looks much better in steel, as
the bird is a different colour from the rest of the helmet.
